title: Giftvoucher – cancle before payment
text: If a giftvoucher has been used in a sale and the customer regrets the sale before its completed, you can't just cancel the sale again. Where you can usually click Go To Sale and then regret it, once the giftvoucher has been scanned, it can't be reversed. The only way to reverse a sale like this is to go to Task Manager and shut the POS program down, then reopend and redo the sale. If they have already used a different form of payment (e.g. a different giftvoucher or a credit card), you can no longer cancle the sale. They will have to finish it and do a return instead.
description:
If a giftvoucher has been used in a sale and the customer regrets the sale before its completed, you can't just cancel the sale again. Where you can usually click Go To Sale and then regret it, once the giftvoucher has been scanned, it can't be reversed. 

  

 

  

The only way to reverse a sale like this is to go to Task Manager and shut the POS program down, then reopend and redo the sale. 

  

If they have already used a different form  of payment (e.g. a different giftvoucher or a credit card), you can no longer cancle the sale. They will have to finish it and do a return instead.

title: Giftvoucher – create new
text: Fill in amount Go to payment and choose how to pay (e.g. Cash) and click the green button.
description:
Fill in amount 

  

 

  

  

Go to payment and choose how to pay (e.g. Cash) and click the green button.

title: Giftvoucher – campaign (with 100% discount)
text: If the cusotmer needs giftvouchers for campagins, that they are giving away, they need to create a new giftvoucher with a 100% discount. Fill in amount Choose Discount -> Line % -> Set to 100 Choose appropriate discount code Click Go To Payment Choose Payment form The receipt printer will not print the receipt and the gift voucher. The voucher will be for the amount added. The Receipit will be for 0.
description:
If the cusotmer needs giftvouchers for campagins, that they are giving away, they need to create a new giftvoucher with a 100% discount. 

  

 

  

Fill in amount 

  

 

  

Choose Discount -> Line % -> Set to 100 

  

 

  

Choose appropriate discount code 

  

 

  

Click Go To Payment 

  

 

  

Choose Payment form 

  

The receipt printer will not print the receipt and the gift voucher. The voucher will be for the amount added. The Receipit will be for 0.

title: Giftvoucher – old
text: If the shop assistant accidentally has used old giftvoucher and completed the transaction, the receipt cannot be deleted. The sale can be returned by pressing Return, choosing alternative payment, manual payment and then choosing something that fits (cash, debit, credit etc.). The note should then be handed over to bookkeeping with an explanation of what went wrong. The sale can now be repeated correctly.
description:
If the shop assistant accidentally has used old giftvoucher and completed the transaction, the receipt cannot be deleted. 

  

The sale can be returned by pressing Return, choosing alternative payment, manual payment and then choosing something that fits (cash, debit, credit etc.). 

  

The note should then be handed over to bookkeeping with an explanation of what went wrong. 

  

The sale can now be repeated correctly.

title: Giftvoucher - with discount
text: If the giftvoucher for a specific amount should be sold for less, do this: 1. Create the giftvoucher like normal 2. Click on Discount and New price (line) 3. Enter new price and click green button 4. Choose appropriate discount code 5. 6. Click Go to payment 7. Choose payment option and click green button The receipt will be printed with the discounted amount, while the giftvoucher will be for the full amount.
description:
If the giftvoucher for a specific amount should be sold for less, do this:  

  

  1. 1. Create the giftvoucher like normal 

  1. 2. Click on Discount and New price (line) 
      

 

  1. 3. Enter new price and click green button 

  

  1.  

  1. 4. Choose appropriate discount code 

  5.

 

  

  

  1. 6. Click Go to payment 

  

 

  

  1. 7. Choose payment option and click green button 

  

The receipt will be printed with the discounted amount, while the giftvoucher will be for the full amount.

title: Disable Old giftcard button on POS under payment
text: The customers can contact us to disable the Andet gavekort and tilgodebevis buttons on pos under the menu payment as shown in the below screenshot. In order to disable it,login to client DdD admin and change disableoldgiftcardandcreditnote from 0 to 1 as shown restart the POS and now the buttons should be disabled as shown.
description:
The customers can contact us to disable the Andet gavekort and tilgodebevis buttons on pos under the menu payment as shown in the below screenshot.




In order to disable it,login to client DdD admin and change disableoldgiftcardandcreditnote from 0 to 1 as shown


restart the POS and now the buttons should be disabled as shown.
